name: MUTANT HIGHWAY
description:
MUTANT HIGHWAY, a remake of FREEWAY MUTANT by Butterscotch Shenanigans with a few little extras thrown in.

Move your running alien with the mouse. Jump over obstacles with your CTRL button. You will automatically shoot at enemies that are in your sights.

Once you've practiced a bit, try enabling some of the features on the setup screen. These will make the game a bit more challenging (and enabling a lot of them simultaneously will make it MUCH more challenging), but your score will be amped up with each enabled challenge.

NOTE: Does the game seem stuck after you die? Press the ESC key to be brought back to the startup screen.

CREDITS
Developed by let-off-studios with Clickteam Fusion. Artwork by my good friend Skeleghoul. Sounds by me using www.bfxr.net , and music tracks from www.playonloop.com .

Have fun, and "THANK YOU FOR PLAY!!!"
